name: Big Query To GCS Bucket
description: Apache Beam Template for moving data from Big Query to GCS Bucket

parameters.name: numShards
parameters.label: Number of shards to write to the GCS Bucket
parameters.helpText: Number of shards to write to the GCS Bucket - example: 3

parameters.name: table
parameters.label: BigQuery source table name
parameters.helpText: Big Query source table name - example: <project>:<dataset>.<table>

parameters.name: fields
parameters.label: Column Fields
parameters.helpText: Big Query column fields - example: col1,col2,col3
